snippet: South Sudan has arrested four soldiers after residents accused the army of beating and raping civilians in a small village near the capital last month, a military spokesman said on Friday, in a case that became a symbol of spiraling military abuse...

headline.main: Rituals, Wild Animals and a Few Giggles
headline.print_headline: High Priestesses of the Runway Wild

lead_paragraph: South Sudan has arrested four soldiers after residents accused the army of beating and raping civilians in a small village near the capital last month, a military spokesman said on Friday, in a case that became a symbol of spiraling military abuses.
